RelatedSentence: With generally bright US economic data and eurozone 's impending stimulus propping up dollar prospects , we are more inclined to a bearish break in gold prices , said Phillip Futures analyst Joyce Liu .

With generally bright US economic data and eurozone 's impending stimulus propping up dollar prospects , we are more inclined to a bearish break in gold prices , said Phillip Futures analyst Joyce Liu .
